wilpattuNationalPark.title: Wilpattu National Park
wilpattuNationalPark.description: Experience the untouched wilderness and natural beauty of Wilpattu National Park. A haven for wildlife enthusiasts and nature lovers.

aboutWilpattuNationalPark.title: About Wilpattu National Park
aboutWilpattuNationalPark.description: Wilpattu, situated in the northwest of Sri Lanka, is the largest national park in the country. Its pristine landscapes and diverse habitats make it a sanctuary for a wide range of wildlife species.
aboutWilpattuNationalPark.mainAttractions: Leopards, Elephants, Sloth Bears, and numerous bird species
